Articles.Content:
Hy

I was just deleting half of KSP files on my pc and thought is there any good MOD Manager for KSP (like Skyrim Nexus) where you install a mod, program backs up the original files and when you decide to delete/remove/deactivate the mod it deletes the files and puts back originals...

Is there someone willing to make something like that????

ps sorry for bad english it is my second lang...

have a god flight

Hy

I was just deleting half of KSP files on my pc and thought is there any good MOD Manager for KSP (like Skyrim Nexus) where you install a mod, program backs up the original files and when you decide to delete/remove/deactivate the mod it deletes the files and puts back originals...

Is there someone willing to make something like that????

ps sorry for bad english it is my second lang...

have a god flight

There's this thing up on the left corner called SEARCH!!!!

but here you go!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/26031-Win-KSP-Mod-Admin-v1-2-5-Mod-install-with-2-klicks

Keep in mind that such a mod manager would have to do a bit more than just adding and removing stuff from gamedata. Craft files would have to be edited/disabled. The persistence file is another big problem if you have modded parts on already saved crafts those flights will be cancelled..

So, as nice as the current mod managers are.. i dont think that anyone will come up with THE one click solution that just works.
